title: Create PresetManager component with factory presets, JSON I/O, and browser UI
description:
Implement complete preset management system for Choir V2.0 including:
- PresetManager.h/cpp with JSON I/O using nlohmann/json
- Factory preset system with 8 included presets
- User preset creation and management
- Preset browser UI component
- Import/export functionality
- Preset validation and compatibility checking
